ch.hevs.gdx2d.lib

Class Game2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.hevs.gdx2d.lib.Game2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApplicationListener

    public class Game2D
extends Object
implements ApplicationListener
    A wrapper for the ApplicationListener class provided for the INF1 class. Used mainly for creating a LwjglApplication in PortableApplication.

    Links together a PortableApplication, which is the class instantiated by the user and GdxGraphics. This link is made by proper calls at GdxGraphics for important events such as rendering (in render() method) or scaling (in resize(int, int)).

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Pierre-Andr√© Mudry (mui), Nils Chatton
